articles.title: Feds on track to have enough doses of COVID-19 vaccine for all eligible Canadians - Canada News - Castanet.net
articles.description: The federal government expects to receive enough doses of COVID-19 vaccine this week to fully inoculate all eligible Canadians.
articles.content:

articles.author: Bianca Nogrady
articles.title: Mounting evidence suggests Sputnik COVID vaccine is safe and effective
articles.description: Russia's vaccine is in use in nearly 70 nations, but its adoption has been slowed by controversies and questions over rare side effects, and it has yet to garner World Health Organization approval.
articles.content:
Vials of the Sputnik COVID-19 vaccine pass along a production line at a manufacturing facility near Saint Petersburg, Russia.Credit: Olga Maltseva/AFP/Getty

articles.title: W.H.O. Experts Seek Limits on Human Gene-Editing Experiments
articles.description: The panel also called on countries to ensure that beneficial forms of genetic alteration be shared equitably.
articles.content: The W.H.O. committee described an invented scenario where researchers from a rich country want to do a clinical trial of sickle-cell gene editing in sub-Saharan Africa, where the disease is prevalent… [+1891 chars]
